column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had the best dining experience of our lives at Bavette's. And we eat out a lot! From the moment we walked in the door
column2: got seated and met our server to the moment we walked out of the restaurant
column3: bellies full and smiles on our faces. The service was impeccable and a team effort
column4: we never wanted or waited for anything. Five seconds after we placed our dessert order
column5: someone else was there placing dessert silverware in front of us...we noted and appreciated the level of communication between staff that's required for that kind of seamless service. But it wasn't over the top. Most of it was done quietly without interruption. And no one hovered. Our main server was witty and informative. An expert with the menu and service.
